title: Artwork: Who draws the best caricatures? - Quora

response.answer_text: As per my opinion, answer is The Caricature Artists.  Experienced and talented artists at The Caricature Artists have significant creative expertise in drawing conceptional and best caricature services for gifting and other happy purposes in digital formats. To make your loved ones happy & excited, they are professionally committed to deliver high quality and unique caricatures. To know more, visit at Digital Caricature Services - The Caricature Artists

Tracy J. Butler maybe? I know she makes the greatest faces ever.Lackadaisy Tannenbaum by *tracyjb on deviantART
Then again, you have Walt Disney...
I answered this here: Caricature: Who is the greatest caricaturist in history? with either Mort Drucker or David Levine.
